TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeWalker extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 자동화 클라이언트가 볼는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소 집합으로 바탕 화면에서 트리 구조에서 정렬 된 개체입니다.UI Automation clients view the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements on the desktop as a set of objects arranged in a tree structure. 사용 하는 클래스, 클라이언트 응용 프로그램을 이동할 수는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 뷰를 선택 하 고 하나에서 한 단계씩 실행 하 여 트리 를 사용 하 여 지정 된 방향에서 다른는 , , , , 및 메서드.Using the class, a client application can navigate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree by selecting a view of the tree and stepping from one to another in a specified direction using the , , , , and methods. 탐색의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 를 사용 하 여 트리 프로세스 간 호출을 발생할 수 있으며 더 효율적으로 사용 하 여 요소를 찾는 또는 메서드.Navigating the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree using can result in cross-process calls and is not as efficient as locating an element using the or methods. 모든 확인 해야 하는 경우 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 자체 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 찾으려고, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 별도 스레드에서 호출 합니다.If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.Condition condition) cil managed

param.name: condition
param.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

span.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소와 일치 하지 않는 `condition` 때 건너뜁니다 요소 트리를 탐색 하는 데 사용 됩니다. elements that do not match `condition` are skipped over when is used to navigate the element tree. 모든 확인 해야 하는 경우 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 자체 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 찾으려고, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 별도 스레드에서 호출 합니다.If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 구성 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 사용할를 탐색 합니다.The following example shows how you can construct a that navigates only among enabled elements. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#174)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#174)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Condition As Condition
public: property System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ Condition { System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ get(); };

The condition that defines the view.
This is the value that was passed to the constructor.

summary.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as content controls.

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as content controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 모든 확인 해야 하는 경우 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 자체 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 찾으려고, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 별도 스레드에서 호출 합니다.If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 다음 예제와 요소는 하위 트리에 있는 트리 뷰를 생성 하는 데 사용 되 고 있습니다.The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 에 대 한 사용량 는 동일 합니다.The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]

Public Shared ReadOnly ControlViewWalker As TreeWalker

summary.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as controls.

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 모든 확인 해야 하는 경우 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 자체 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 찾으려고, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 별도 스레드에서 호출 합니다.If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 다음 예제와 요소는 하위 트리에 있는 트리 뷰를 생성 하는 데 사용 되 고 있습니다.The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]

summary.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 현재 보기 조건과 일치 하지 않는 요소 트리를 탐색할 때 반환 되지 않는 추가 자식 요소가 있을 수 있습니다.An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 구조는 변경 내용으로 표시 되는 트리 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 데스크톱 변경 내용에 대 한 요소입니다.The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 반환 된 요소가 다음 번에 첫 번째 자식 요소를 첫 번째 자식으로 반환 됩니다는 보장 되지 않습니다.It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the first child.

returns.span: The first child element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

span.span: The first child element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

summary.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified .

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 구조는 변경 내용으로 표시 되는 트리 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 데스크톱 변경 내용에 대 한 요소입니다.The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 반환 된 요소가 다음 번에 부모 요소를 상위 반환는 보장 되지 않습니다.It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified .

returns.span: The parent element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or if the parent element is not visible in the current view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 구조는 변경 내용으로 표시 되는 트리 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 데스크톱 변경 내용에 대 한 요소입니다.The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 반환 된 요소가 다음 번에 부모 요소를 상위 반환는 보장 되지 않습니다.It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.

summary.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 현재 보기 조건과 일치 하지 않는 요소 트리를 탐색할 때 반환 되지 않는 추가 형제 요소가 있을 수 있습니다.An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 구조는 변경 내용으로 표시 되는 트리 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 데스크톱 변경 내용에 대 한 요소입니다.The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 반환 된 요소가 다음 번에 이전의 형제 요소를 이전 형제도 반환 됩니다는 보장 되지 않습니다.It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 현재 보기 조건과 일치 하지 않는 요소 트리를 탐색할 때 반환 되지 않는 추가 형제 요소가 있을 수 있습니다.An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 구조는 변경 내용으로 표시 되는 트리 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 데스크톱 변경 내용에 대 한 요소입니다.The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 반환 된 요소가 다음 번에 이전의 형제 요소를 이전 형제도 반환 됩니다는 보장 되지 않습니다.It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

summary.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

span.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 에 대 한 보기 조건에 맞는 요소까지 트리에서 상위 체인을 탐색 하 여 정규화 된 요소는 개체에 도달 했습니다.The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 루트 요소에 도달할 경우 루트 요소 보기 조건을 만족 하지 않는 경우에 반환 됩니다.If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 이 메서드는에 대 한 참조를 가져오는 응용 프로그램에 유용 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 적중 테스트를 통해 요소입니다.This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 응용 프로그램 수 특정 유형의 요소에만 작동 하 고 צ ְ ײ 에 어떤 요소가 처음 때 검색 됩니다 (예를 들어 스크롤 막대가 입력 포커스), 없이 대상 (예: 콘텐츠 요소의 궁극적으로 요소)가 검색 됩니다.The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement Normalize(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed
Public Function Normalize (element As AutomationElement) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: The element from which to start the normalization.

span.span: The element from which to start the normalization.

summary.span: Retrieves the node itself, if it satisfies the , or the nearest parent or ancestor node that satisfies the .

span.span: Retrieves the node itself, if it satisfies the , or the nearest parent or ancestor node that satisfies the .

returns.span: The nearest in the current view.

span.span: The nearest in the current view.

returns.span: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.

span.span: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker RawViewWalker
Public Shared ReadOnly RawViewWalker As TreeWalker

summary.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of all the elements in the tree.

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of all the elements in the tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 모든 확인 해야 하는 경우 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 자체 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 찾으려고, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 별도 스레드에서 호출 합니다.If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 다음 예제와 요소는 하위 트리에 있는 트리 뷰를 생성 하는 데 사용 되 고 있습니다.The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 에 대 한 사용량 는 동일 합니다.The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]
